import React, { Component } from "react"; import Sim1 from "./sketch1"; import P5Wrapper from "./P5Wrapper"; class Simulations extends Component { state = { start: false, reset: false, height1:null, height2:null, }; render() { return (

); } ButtonClick = event => { const { value, name } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: true }); }; handleSelect = event => { const {target:{value}}=event; if(value==='true') this.setState({Inelastic:true}); else this.setState({Inelastic:false}); }; } export default Simulations;
